# supportedNetworks

**Instance Property**

An array of payment networks the merchant supports.

## Declaration

```swift
var supportedNetworks: [PKPaymentNetwork] { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property constrains the selectable payment passes to those the array includes — for example, [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentNetwork/visa] or [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentNetwork/masterCard].

## Setting the merchant information

- **merchantIdentifier**: A string that identifies the merchant.
- **merchantCapabilities**: A value that represents the payment-processing capabilities of the merchant.
